question:
You work in an international compny. You need to take some time off work.




Write a letter to your employer. In your letter
- explain why you need this time off
- give details of when you want the time off
- say who can do your work when you are away
text: I hope you are doing well. I am writing this letter to inquire about a three-month off. As you know, I have been working in this company for six years, and I am wondering if I will be eligible for a short period paid off.

I aim to plan a trip to visit my family in Iran as I haven't met them since two years ago. Two years is a long time, and unfortunately due to the ,pandemic I couldn't take part in my brother's wedding ceremony. Therefore, it's a good time to plan to visit my country and reunite with my family.

My wife and I have planned to buy flight tickets for this November to run away from Canada's winter for a while; moreover, in the last three months of the year my hometown, Ahvaz, has  very cool weather, so we can take advantage of both cool weather in winter and visiting the family.

During that time off period, Terry can take my responsibilities to move the project forwards and collaborate with stakeholders. Since we have had a lot of discussions regarding the project, he is totally onboarded and can lead the project  as long as I am on vacation. Looking forward to hearing back from you.

error_list.error_des: There should be no comma after the article the in your sentence. Remove the comma.
